input.sentences: the band getting ready for the school concert .
the whole band tuning up during rehearsal .
everyone filing in for the big school concert .
standing ovation after the big performance .
all the guys stayed behind to help put the chairs away .
output.sentences: As the night begins the soundboard is adjusted for the rehearsal.
Rehearsal is a great way to loosen up before a big show.
With tensions high and a big crowd out there, it is show time!
It was such a great show that we got a standing ovation!
After such a great night, I really appreciated my brother and his friends cleaning everything up.
